data.name: Riding Seas Demo
data.detailed_description:
Riding Seas is a cartoon-style boat racing game that fits into the arcade racing games of the 2000s (WaveRace, Splashdown, ...). A family friendly game, with varied, colorful and fun decorations in which you will find many references to cinema and / or video games.



Warning !! Its colorful graphics hide a tactical game where the gameplay emphasizes piloting, where other games emphasize random bonuses!



The game offers:
[/img] 30 boats with a totally crazy look are available and unlockable according to your exploits! [img] {STEAM_APP_IMAGE} /extras/puce.png [/ img] A simple race mode allows you to train on all the races of the game. A career mode allows you to finish first of a certain number of Grand Prix each made up of 4 races with increasing difficulty. [img] {STEAM_APP_IMAGE} /extras/puce.png [/ img] A local multiplayer game mode, up to 4 in split screen, lets you take on your friends in fun games. [img] {STEAM_APP_IMAGE} /extras/puce.png [/ img] You are a competitor and you want to face players from all over the world, nothing could be easier a ghost / time trial mode awaits you and allows you to record your best times for each race and compare

30 boats with a totally crazy look are available and unlockable according to your exploits!

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} /extras/puce.png [/] A simple race mode allows you to train on all the races of the game. A career mode allows you to finish first of a certain number of Grand Prix each made up of 4 races with increasing difficulty.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} /extras/puce.png [/] A local multiplayer game mode, up to 4 in split screen, lets you take on your friends in fun games.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} /extras/puce.png [/] You are a competitor and you want to face players from all over the world, nothing could be easier a ghost / time trial mode awaits you and allows you to record your best times for each race and compare them to the best players in the world !!

At your controls! The race has already started!

data.short_description: Climb aboard various, colorful and fun boats to prove your piloting skills in frenzied races with current cartoon graphics! Be careful in RIDING SEAS there is no room for chance!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: INTEL I5-4690k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: INTEL I7-9750H ( 2.6Ghz )
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
